sourceMeaningMnemonic: On a <radical>scooter</radical> running in one <radical>direction</radical> is a <radical>gun</radical>-toting <radical>child</radical>. This is a terribly dangerous situation, but to the child it is just <kanji>play</kanji>.
meaningInfo: Imagine a child riding a scooter with a gun having a good time. "Come play with me!" they shout. "No!" you yell back.
readingMnemonic: Everything is <kanji>play</kanji> for <reading>you</reading>ths (<ja>ゆう</ja>), even if it's a terrible, scary, not good situation like this one.
readingInfo:
Imagine trying to explain to the youth that this is not play and that they should stop, but them youths can't stop playing.

P.S. From the WaniKani staff to you: Don't let youths play with guns, please.
